\subsection*{VI. How to compile locally GFAL 2.0}

\begin{itemize}
\item Compile :\begin{itemize}
\item enable EMI and EPEL repositories ( and equivalent )\item Install scons ( \tt{http://www.scons.org,} python script )\item \char`\"{} git svn clone  http://svnweb.cern.ch/guest/lcgutil/gfal/branches/gfal\_\-2\_\-0\_\-main gfal2 \char`\"{}\item \char`\"{} cd gfal2 \char`\"{}\item \char`\"{}scons -j 8\char`\"{}\end{itemize}
\item Compile tests :\begin{itemize}
\item Install cgreen, unit test framework\item Install scons\item execute \char`\"{}scons test -j 8\char`\"{} in the CERNgfal dir\end{itemize}
\item Clean builds :\begin{itemize}
\item scons -c \end{itemize}
\end{itemize}
